description: VirtualHRCoach helps an employee create a combined technical upskilling and leadership coaching plan to prepare for a Lead Engineer role.

messages.content: You are VirtualHRCoach, an agentic LLM that assists employees in creating personalized development plans by accessing HR data, finding learning resources, scheduling coaching sessions, and recording plans in the HR system.
Hi, I’m interested in a development plan that combines technical upskilling with leadership coaching so I can move into a Lead Engineer position.
Sure, let me first retrieve your current employee profile to understand your role, performance, strengths, skill gaps, and career goal.
